name: MEC Glide XC Midweight Gloves - Unisex
description: Warm, highly breathable cross-country ski gloves. Synthetic insulation keeps your hands happy while skiing groomed trails or touring. The Glide XC are also a good option when you’re out for a cold-weather run.Stretchy nylon and spandex shell fabric with DWR finish combines mobility with weather resistance.160g synthetic insulation (50% recycled content) for lots of warmth.Soft fleece linings wick moisture and dry quickly.Stretch Ax suede synthetic palms, for excellent dexterity when gripping poles or adjusting equipment.Polyurethane foam on palm and thumb adds pole-gripping comfort.Terry cloth nose wipes on thumbs.Polyester and spandex cuffs seal weather out and heat in.
